Articles.Content:
List your favorite mods here. People can stop by and take a look at what works for many people, and use those mods. That's why I made this-- so those of us looking for good mods have a place to check out.

My list: Kerbal Attachment System, Kerbal Inventory System, Kerbal Alarm Clock, Restock+ (honestly, I would change just a few of the Restock textures, but that's just me), Mechjeb2, Hullcam, Tweakscale.
and that have my name on them.

A few I haven't seen mentioned (as) often:

  • CrewLight - makes it easy to find where you stashed the crew on large station
  • EngineLightRelit - Looks so much better when all those flames actually light up the surroundings
  • MechJeb2 custom menus - I have launch, landing, orbit and intercept menus to display  extra info missing from stock displays - Last I looked Kerbal Engineer had most of the info MJ2 did (just missing one item)
  • GravityTurn - Resupply launches become tedious after the umpteenth time
  • NRAP - Great for testing standard boosters
  • PortraitStats - Extra info on the crew in the portrait display
  • GPOSpeedFuelPump - Automates transferring resources (not working in 1.8.X yet)
